title: Ticket #5941: Suppressing job log files in DAGMan produces a log file named ''
description:
Setting DAGMAN_SUPPRESS_JOB_LOGS to false in your DAGMan configuration causes a log file named '' (two single quotes) to be created; this file contains the full workflow log.

Note: I'm not sure what the first version is where this problem showed up -- I was able to reproduce it in 8.5.8. AS far as I know, nothing related has changed on the DAGMan end of things, so I wonder if something changed in the schedd...
remarks:
2016-Oct-02 21:45:36 by wenger:
Hmm -- this does happen in 8.4.10 -- I wonder if it was happening all along and we never noticed it?

2016-Oct-02 22:17:18 by wenger:
Hmm -- this does not happen in 8.2.11.

2016-Oct-03 12:52:48 by tpdownes:
It is very reasonable to suppose that this has been happening for a while. I went from 8.2 to 8.5 and have only recently been able to tackle integrating these knobs into my config.

I intend to track the development series going forward so my feedback cycle will be much shortened.

Tom

2016-Oct-04 11:45:09 by wenger:
Created V8_4-gittrac_5941-branch for this.

2016-Oct-05 10:34:08 by wenger:
Okay, I think I have a fix for this. One DAGMan test failed on Win10, need to make sure that's just a random Windows test failure.

Probably assign to TJ for review, because this involved a change in condor_submit.

2016-Oct-05 15:33:35 by wenger:
TJ says condor_submit changes need to be replicated in submit_utils.

2016-Oct-06 14:19:49 by wenger:
Note: submit_utils is in 8.5, not in 8.4.

2016-Oct-06 14:54:22 by johnkn:
CODE_REVIEW: looks good for stable. part of the fix will need to be applied to submit_utils also when the change is merged to the devel branch.

2016-Oct-07 10:57:46 by wenger:
Hmm -- now I'm thinking I should make another branch off of 8.5, merge this feature branch to that branch, and fix up the submit utils stuff there...

2016-Oct-07 15:42:07 by wenger:
Okay, created V8_5-gittrac_5941-branch to do the 8.5 stuff...

2016-Oct-07 16:35:14 by wenger:
I'm going to assign this to TJ again for re-review so he can check the 8.5 submit_utils changes.

2016-Oct-10 16:46:34 by wenger:
This is all merged to both 8.4 and 8.5. I'm going to assign it to TJ for review so he can retroactively look at the 8.5 submit_utils fixes.

2016-Oct-12 12:14:11 by wenger:
I'm just going to resolve this...
